mapper.select: select l.OPENNUM,l.lnum,l.DIVIDENUM,l.LYEAR,l.TERM, li.GRADE, li.lname, l.BOOK,find_code_name(100,li.dcode) as division, l.NEWLIMITCOUNT, lr.LRNAME, l.TIMETABLE, l.DATESTATUS from lecture l, lecture_info li, LECTURE_ROOM lr where l.lnum = li.lnum and l.LRCODE = lr.LRCODE and l.pid=#{pid} and lyear = to_char(sysdate, 'RRRR') and term = 1 order by 1

SELECT SM.OPENNUM, SM.SID, S.SNAME, L.LNUM, LI.LNAME, SM.MIDDLESCORE, SM.FINALSCORE, SM.HOMEWORK, SM.ATTENDANCESCORE, SM.TOTAL, SM.RANK FROM SCORE_MANA SM, STUDENTS S, LECTURE L, LECTURE_INFO LI WHERE SM.SID = S.SID AND L.OPENNUM = SM.OPENNUM AND L.LNUM = LI.LNUM AND L.PID = #{pid} AND SM.OPENNUM = #{opennum}

select l.OPENNUM,l.lnum,l.DIVIDENUM,l.LYEAR,l.TERM, li.GRADE, li.lname, l.BOOK,find_code_name(100,li.dcode) as division, l.NEWLIMITCOUNT, lr.LRNAME, l.TIMETABLE, l.DATESTATUS from lecture l, lecture_info li, LECTURE_ROOM lr where l.lnum = li.lnum and l.LRCODE = lr.LRCODE and l.pid=#{pid} and lyear = to_char(sysdate, 'RRRR') and term = 1
